author: CoffeeBrickMan
title: Quick Mini Review
review:
Spugg is the first of the Series 5 Mixels of the Lixers Tribe. He has the smallest tongue of the members of this tribe.

He's quite cute, with a characterful face which rotates (like a clock), and 4 ball&sockets joints for pose-ability

There are a good set parts including the above mentioned ball&socket joints, and a variety of pieces in that yellow/orange colour (Fl.Yell-Ora), as well as standard yellow.

Quick build time 3 minutes.

He's probably my favourite of the Lixers, but this whole tribe is a little lack lustre in my opinion.

author: Trigger_
title: Good Set, But Only as Good as Lunk
review:
My positives about this set: The detail on his back is extremely nice, as well as his (all ball jointed) quadruped legs. But these are the negatives:

  • Tail cannot be posed.
  • Falls over a lot.
  • The head spinning is cool, but it is really hard to position it to look normal.

Still better than Seismo.
